Package ca.phon.ipa

Class CompoundPhone

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.phon.ipa.IPAElement
      • ca.phon.ipa.Phone
        • ca.phon.ipa.CompoundPhone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExtendable, CombiningDiacritics, PrefixDiacritics, SuffixDiacritics, Visitable<IPAElement>
    public final class CompoundPhone
extends Phone
    A compound Phone consists of two phones connected by a ligature.
